name: Soul Shifter (dkomnen)
description:
Submission for Godot Wild Jam 25

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

LMB or ENTER - Attack

Shift - Dash

E - Spirit Shift

Wildcard used - No HUD

Programming - dkomen

Tileset - dkomnen

Background - Glacial Mountaints by YNITTI(itch.io)

Music - Winter by MuncheyBobo(opengameart)

SFX - Bfxr

Created with Godot, Aseprite, and Bfxr
